description: I use crimp rings with spacers because they stay on the PEX B while crimping. After the crimp, I use the Go/No-Go gauge to ensure it was done right. The bell hanger keeps the PEX B secured to the vanity cabinet and is a nice touch. Remember, when you join our Video Library today you'll also get our Beginner Curbed Shower Remodeling Course for free at https://homerepairtutor.com/platinum-membership/
title: How to Install PEX B Shut Off Valve - #shorts #homerepairtutor
